synopsis.text: Freeza's defeat marked the dawn of a new era, as Goku and his comrades anticipated a tranquil existence on Earth. During a serene camping excursion with Gohan and Krillin, their peace is shattered by the arrival of Cooler and his ruthless minions. Cooler, seeking vengeance for his brother Freeza's demise, sets his sights on Goku. As the battle escalates, Cooler unveils his formidable fourth evolutionary stage, pushing Goku to the brink. However, the hero rises to the challenge and undergoes a Super Saiyan transformation, setting the stage for an epic showdown between these powerful adversaries. The fate of Earth hangs in the balance as Goku faces off against Cooler in this thrilling adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
